Title: The Motives of the Mantid
Description:
$C. You may be of assistance.

The Shado-Pan wishes to know why the mantid are attacking so violently. We have our suspicions, but we cannot be sure. Furthermore, we do not want the mantid to know that we are investigating them.

That's where you come in.

I need you to kill the mantid of Kri'vess, in the north. I will lurk behind you in the shadows, and search for clues on their bodies.
ObjectivesText: Slay mantid in Kri'vess so Tai Ho can look for clues on their bodies.
RewardText: The abundance of yak hair on that mantid's body suggests one thing... it came from Niuzao Temple. Our journey continues westward, $c.
